verses.verse: כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When יִקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> hath taken אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> When a man אִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> a wife וּבְעָלָ֑הּ <S%H1166><s%> and married וְהָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> happens אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> no תִמְצָא־ <S%H4672><s%> her and it come to pass that she find חֵ֣ן <S%H2580><s%> no favour בְּעֵינָ֗יו <S%H5869><s%> in his eyes כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> because מָ֤צָא <S%H4672><s%> because he hath found בָהּ֙ עֶרְוַ֣ת <S%H6172><s%> uncleanness דָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> some וְכָ֨תַב <S%H3789><s%> in her then let him write לָ֜הּ סֵ֤פֶר <S%H5612><s%> her a bill כְּרִיתֻת֙ <S%H3748><s%> of divorcement וְנָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> and give בְּיָדָ֔הּ <S%H3027><s%> [it] in her hand וְשִׁלְּחָ֖הּ <S%H7971><s%> and send מִבֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1004><s%> her out of his house

וְיָצְאָ֖ה <S%H3318><s%> And when she is departed out מִבֵּית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> of his house וְהָלְכָ֖ה <S%H1980><s%> she may go וְהָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> and becomes לְאִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> man's אַחֵֽר׃ <S%H312><s%> and be another

וּשְׂנֵאָהּ֮ <S%H8130><s%> hate הָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> husband הָאַחֲרוֹן֒ <S%H314><s%> And [if] the latter וְכָ֨תַב <S%H3789><s%> her and write לָ֜הּ סֵ֤פֶר <S%H5612><s%> her a bill כְּרִיתֻת֙ <S%H3748><s%> of divorcement וְנָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> and giveth בְּיָדָ֔הּ <S%H3027><s%> [it] in her hand וְשִׁלְּחָ֖הּ <S%H7971><s%> and sendeth מִבֵּית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> her out of his house א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or כִ֤י <S%H3588><s%> if יָמוּת֙ <S%H4191><s%> die הָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> husband הָאַחֲר֔וֹן <S%H314><s%> or if the latter אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who לְקָחָ֥הּ <S%H3947><s%> which took ל֖וֹ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <S%H802><s%> her [to be] his wife

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not יוּכַ֣ל <S%H3201><s%> may בַּעְלָ֣הּ <S%H1167><s%> husband הָרִאשׁ֣וֹן <S%H7223><s%> Her former אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who שִׁ֠לְּחָהּ <S%H7971><s%> which sent her away לָשׁ֨וּב <S%H7725><s%> her again לְקַחְתָּ֜הּ <S%H3947><s%> not take לִהְי֧וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become ל֣וֹ לְאִשָּׁ֗ה <S%H802><s%> to be his wife אַחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> after אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הֻטַּמָּ֔אָה <S%H2930><s%> that she is defiled כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that תוֹעֵבָ֥ה <S%H8441><s%> for that [is] abomination הִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> he לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַחֲטִיא֙ <S%H2398><s%> to sin אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and thou shalt not cause the land אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> who יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth לְךָ֖ נַחֲלָֽה׃ <S%H5159><s%> thee [for] an inheritance ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When יִקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> hath taken אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> When a man אִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> wife חֲדָשָׁ֔ה <S%H2319><s%> a new לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> nor יֵצֵא֙ <S%H3318><s%> he shall not go out בַּצָּבָ֔א <S%H6635><s%> to war וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יַעֲבֹ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> neither shall he be charged עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> with לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any דָּבָ֑ר <S%H1697><s%> with any business נָקִ֞י <S%H5355><s%> [but] he shall be free יִהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְבֵיתוֹ֙ <S%H1004><s%> at home שָׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> year אֶחָ֔ת <S%H259><s%> one וְשִׂמַּ֖ח <S%H8055><s%> and shall cheer up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אִשְׁתּ֥וֹ <S%H802><s%> his wife אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom לָקָֽח׃ <S%H3947><s%> which he hath taken ס

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> No יַחֲבֹ֥ל <S%H2254><s%> to pledge רֵחַ֖יִם <S%H7347><s%> the nether וָרָ֑כֶב <S%H7393><s%> or the upper millstone כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נֶ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> [a man's] life ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he חֹבֵֽל׃ <S%H2254><s%> to pledge ס

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יִמָּצֵ֣א <S%H4672><s%> be found אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> If a man גֹּנֵ֨ב <S%H1589><s%> stealing נֶ֤פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> any מֵאֶחָיו֙ <S%H251><s%> of his brethren מִבְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְהִתְעַמֶּר־ <S%H6014><s%> and maketh merchandise בּ֖וֹ וּמְכָר֑וֹ <S%H4376><s%> of him or selleth וּמֵת֙ <S%H4191><s%> shall die הַגַּנָּ֣ב <S%H1590><s%> him then that thief הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> you וּבִֽעַרְתָּ֥ <S%H1197><s%> away הָרָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> evil מִקִּרְבֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H7130><s%> from among

הִשָּׁ֧מֶר <S%H8104><s%> Take heed בְּנֶֽגַע־ <S%H5061><s%> in the plague הַצָּרַ֛עַת <S%H6883><s%> of leprosy לִשְׁמֹ֥ר <S%H8104><s%> that thou observe מְאֹ֖ד <S%H3966><s%> diligently וְלַעֲשׂ֑וֹת <S%H6213><s%> and do כְּכֹל֩ <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after יוֹר֨וּ <S%H3384><s%> shall teach אֶתְכֶ֜ם <S%H853><s%> הַכֹּהֲנִ֧ים <S%H3548><s%> according to all that the priests הַלְוִיִּ֛ם <S%H3881><s%> the Levites כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> you צִוִּיתִ֖ם <S%H6680><s%> you as I commanded תִּשְׁמְר֥וּ <S%H8104><s%> them [so] ye shall observe לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <S%H6213><s%> to do ס

זָכ֕וֹר <S%H2142><s%> Remember אֵ֧ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what עָשָׂ֛ה <S%H6213><s%> did יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לְמִרְיָ֑ם <S%H4813><s%> unto Miriam בַּדֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way בְּצֵאתְכֶ֥ם <S%H3318><s%> after that ye were come forth מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt ס

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When תַשֶּׁ֥ה <S%H5383><s%> When thou dost lend בְרֵֽעֲךָ <S%H7453><s%> thy brother מַשַּׁ֣את <S%H4859><s%> thing מְא֑וּמָה <S%H3972><s%> any לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תָבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> thou shalt not go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֵּית֖וֹ <S%H1004><s%> into his house לַעֲבֹ֥ט <S%H5670><s%> to fetch עֲבֹטֽוֹ׃ <S%H5667><s%> his pledge

בַּח֖וּץ <S%H2351><s%> abroad תַּעֲמֹ֑ד <S%H5975><s%> Thou shalt stand וְהָאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and the man אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> to whom אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you נֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H5383><s%> to whom thou dost lend ב֔וֹ יוֹצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> shall bring out אֵלֶ֛יךָ <S%H413><s%> about אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַעֲב֖וֹט <S%H5667><s%> the pledge הַחֽוּצָה׃ <S%H2351><s%> abroad

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> If אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And if the man עָנִ֖י <S%H6041><s%> [be] poor ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִשְׁכַּ֖ב <S%H7901><s%> thou shalt not sleep בַּעֲבֹטֽוֹ׃ <S%H5667><s%> with his pledge

הָשֵׁב֩ <S%H7725><s%> In any case תָּשִׁ֨יב <S%H7725><s%> again ל֤וֹ אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַעֲבוֹט֙ <S%H5667><s%> him the pledge כְּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> goeth down הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> when the sun וְשָׁכַ֥ב <S%H7901><s%> that he may sleep בְּשַׂלְמָת֖וֹ <S%H8008><s%> in his own raiment וּבֵֽרֲכֶ֑ךָּ <S%H1288><s%> and bless וּלְךָ֙ תִּהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become צְדָקָ֔ה <S%H6666><s%> thee and it shall be righteousness לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> unto thee before יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> thy God ס

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַעֲשֹׁ֥ק <S%H6231><s%> Thou shalt not oppress שָׂכִ֖יר <S%H7916><s%> an hired servant עָנִ֣י <S%H6041><s%> [that is] poor וְאֶבְי֑וֹן <S%H34><s%> and needy מֵאַחֶ֕יךָ <S%H251><s%> [whether he be] of thy brethren א֧וֹ <S%H176><s%> or מִגֵּרְךָ֛ <S%H1616><s%> or of thy strangers אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּאַרְצְךָ֖ <S%H776><s%> that [are] in thy land בִּשְׁעָרֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H8179><s%> within thy gates

בְּיוֹמוֹ֩ <S%H3117><s%> At his day תִתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> thou shalt give שְׂכָר֜וֹ <S%H7939><s%> [him] his hire וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תָב֧וֹא <S%H935><s%> go down עָלָ֣יו <S%H5921><s%> against הַשֶּׁ֗מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> neither shall the sun כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for עָנִי֙ <S%H6041><s%> upon it for he [is] poor ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְאֵלָ֕יו <S%H5921><s%> against ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he נֹשֵׂ֖א <S%H5375><s%> and setteth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H5315><s%> his heart וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> he will not יִקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> upon it lest he cry עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> against אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> against thee unto the LORD וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become בְךָ֖ חֵֽטְא׃ <S%H2399><s%> and it be sin ס

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יוּמְת֤וּ <S%H4191><s%> shall not be put to death אָבוֹת֙ <S%H1><s%> The fathers עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and בָּנִ֔ים <S%H1121><s%> for the children וּבָנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> neither shall the children לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יוּמְת֣וּ <S%H4191><s%> be put to death עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and אָב֑וֹת <S%H1><s%> for the fathers אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man בְּחֶטְא֖וֹ <S%H2399><s%> for his own sin יוּמָֽתוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> shall be put to death ס

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תַטֶּ֔ה <S%H5186><s%> Thou shalt not pervert מִשְׁפַּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> the judgment גֵּ֣ר <S%H1616><s%> of the stranger יָת֑וֹם <S%H3490><s%> [nor] of the fatherless וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תַחֲבֹ֔ל <S%H2254><s%> to pledge בֶּ֖גֶד <S%H899><s%> raiment אַלְמָנָֽה׃ <S%H490><s%> a widow's

וְזָכַרְתָּ֗ <S%H2142><s%> But thou shalt remember כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for עֶ֤בֶד <S%H5650><s%> that thou wast a bondman הָיִ֙יתָ֙ <S%H1961><s%> become בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> in Egypt וַֽיִּפְדְּךָ֛ <S%H6299><s%> redeemed יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God מִשָּׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> there עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> after that אָנֹכִ֤י <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוְּךָ֙ <S%H6680><s%> thee thence therefore I command לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <S%H6213><s%> thee to do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> this thing הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this ס

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> When תִקְצֹר֩ <S%H7114><s%> When thou cuttest down קְצִֽירְךָ֨ <S%H7105><s%> thine harvest בְשָׂדֶ֜ךָ <S%H7704><s%> in thy field וְשָֽׁכַחְתָּ֧ <S%H7911><s%> and hast forgot עֹ֣מֶר <S%H6016><s%> a sheaf בַּשָּׂדֶ֗ה <S%H7704><s%> in the field לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תָשׁוּב֙ <S%H7725><s%> thou shalt not go again לְקַחְתּ֔וֹ <S%H3947><s%> to fetch לַגֵּ֛ר <S%H1616><s%> it it shall be for the stranger לַיָּת֥וֹם <S%H3490><s%> for the fatherless וְלָאַלְמָנָ֖ה <S%H490><s%> and for the widow יִהְיֶ֑ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְמַ֤עַן <S%H4616><s%> order יְבָרֶכְךָ֙ <S%H1288><s%> may bless יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H4639><s%> thee in all the work יָדֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H3027><s%> of thine hands
